item.title: Did The War In Iraq Create Jobs For Americans?
item.description: Is the Iraq War to Blame for the Economic Collapse? War is difficult enough to discuss; the Iraq conflict is far more complicated. Let’s take a different path: Keynesian Economics.

item.title: The Truth About Why Programmers Are More Intelligent Than Doctors?
item.description: Doctors Are Smarter Than All? Is That Possible? — And What That Means For You Discussed In Details! In my country, there is a misconception that All doctors are so brilliant or, even more ridiculously, that Doctors are wiser than others. Today, I want to put this myth to the test.

item.title: Best You Can Do To Improve Your Concentration
item.description: In the modern world, concentration and focus have taken on the characteristics of a dream or even a fantasy. You’re not alone if you’ve ever felt disoriented or uncoordinated while working on something crucial or even when it came down to life or death. I frequently experience this, therefore over the past several months, I have worked many hours to conquer it by remaining focused and dedicated. Please bear with me while I share some advice with you on how to do the same.

item.title: Get Unlimited Medium Articles Using Python
item.description: Read unlimited premium Medium articles for free(!) in Python
